mapper.sql: /*[BaseTmbrUsrInf.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT USR_ID , USR_NM , LGN_ID , LGN_PWD , USR_ANO , USR_EML_ADR , PWD_QST , PWD_ASW , USR_HP_ADDR , USR_SS_CD , USR_AUTH_TP_CD , EML_RCV_YN , MNGR_TP_CD , ACTV_YN , USR_DTL_INF , PWD_FAIL_CNT , PWD_FAIL_DTTM , PWD_UPD_DTTM , LST_LGN_DTTM , IP_ADDR , CTF_TP_CD , JN_CTF_KEY , JN_CTF_DTTM , EML_CTF_KEY , EML_CTF_DTTM , TMP_EML_ADR , FND_CTF_KEY , FND_CTF_KEY_DTTM , USR_TEL_NO_1 , USR_TEL_NO_2 , USR_TEL_NO_3 , USR_MBL_NO_1 , USR_MBL_NO_2 , USR_MBL_NO_3 , USR_ZC , ROD_ADR , LNO_ADR , ADR_DTL , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TMBR_USR_INF WHERE LGN_ID = #{lgn_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USR_ID = #{usr_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: /*[TmbrUsrInf.xml][selectTmbrUsrInfList][사용자 리스트 조회][TANINE]*/ SELECT USR_ID , USR_NM , LGN_ID , LGN_PWD , USR_ANO , USR_EML_ADR , PWD_QST , PWD_ASW , USR_HP_ADDR , USR_SS_CD , USR_AUTH_TP_CD , EML_RCV_YN , MNGR_TP_CD , ACTV_YN , USR_DTL_INF , PWD_FAIL_CNT , PWD_FAIL_DTTM , PWD_UPD_DTTM , IFNULL(LST_LGN_DTTM, CRT_DTTM) AS LST_LGN_DTTM , IP_ADDR , CTF_TP_CD , JN_CTF_KEY , JN_CTF_DTTM , EML_CTF_KEY , EML_CTF_DTTM , TMP_EML_ADR , FND_CTF_KEY , FND_CTF_KEY_DTTM , USR_TEL_NO_1 , USR_TEL_NO_2 , USR_TEL_NO_3 , USR_MBL_NO_1 , USR_MBL_NO_2 , USR_MBL_NO_3 , USR_ZC , ROD_ADR , LNO_ADR , ADR_DTL , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , DATE_FORMAT(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS F_CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM , (SYSDATE()-JN_CTF_DTTM)/60 AS JN_CTF_KEY_TR , (SYSDATE()-EML_CTF_DTTM)/60 AS EML_CTF_KEY_TR , DATEDIFF(SYSDATE(), (CASE WHEN IFNULL(PWD_UPD_DTTM, '') = '' THEN SYSDATE() ELSE PWD_UPD_DTTM END)) AS PW_UPD_TR FROM TMBR_USR_INF WHERE 1 = 1 AND USR_ID = #{usr_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND LGN_ID = #{lgn_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{usr_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') AND ACTV_YN = #{actv_yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EML_CTF_KEY = #{eml_ctf_key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND JN_CTF_KEY = #{jn_ctf_key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USR_EML_ADR = #{usr_eml_adr, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PWD_QST = #{pwd_qst, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PWD_ASW = #{pwd_asw, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY LGN_ID

/*[TmbrUsrInf.xml][selectTmbrUsrInfChkUsrId][회원아이디 유효성 확인][TANINE]*/ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) > 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FLAG FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT LGN_ID FROM ( SELECT LGN_ID FROM TMBR_USR_INF WHERE LGN_ID = #{lgn_id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT CD_NM AS LGN_ID FROM TCMN_CD_DTL WHERE MST_CD = 'BUID' ) T ) TT WHERE TT.LGN_ID = #{lgn_id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
/*[TmbrUsrInf.xml][selectTmbrUsrInfSendMailOkList][이메일수신여부 Y 목록 조회][TANINE]*/ SELECT USR_EML_ADR , LGN_ID FROM TMBR_USR_INF WHERE EML_RCV_YN = 'Y' AND USR_SS_CD = '1'
